MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G34 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 1:51AM. Our engineers have arrived at the Auchinlea Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:10am on 12 November 2020.
